name: Demon Slayer Overcooked (Bad) Hybrid
description:
How To Play:

- Pick up ores from either the grey or red container by clicking on it

- Put the ore into the furnace and wait for the timer to finish to turn the ore into bars

- Place the bar on the anvil and press the space button to hammer it

- Combine a wrap (can be obtained from black and white boxes), blade and guard (can be obtained by playing bar mini-game from brown box) and press "Z" to sell

Bg music by Kevin Macleod
